doneAfk: We've fulfilled plan with your reserves.
planMessages.notDone: Comrade, plan not done, warning and new plan
planMessages.remaining: Boss, %hd days remaining to complete the plan.
extending: Boss, Plan is overdue. Urzedas says you've got
about %hhu days before you get in trouble.

hiScore.press: Press FIRE or ENTER to continue

tutorial.start: Comrade, go dig 3 ores of silver!
onDugOut: Your drill gets damaged and cargo bay filled as you dig.
Get to the warehouse to leave minerals and replace drill.
nearShop: Comrade, press ENTER or FIRE or SPACE to enter shop.
You can sell ore or use it for fulfilling plans.
inShop: You need to spend 3 silver to fulfill the plan. Navigate to it
and move minerals to plan column, then press Confirm.
onMoveToPlan: Congratulations comrade, you've fulfilled your first plan.
Keep doing it and surely you will be promoted!

krystyna.guest: Mr Director, you have guest. He is waiting in your office
krystyna.urzedas: Mr Director, Urzedas wants to see you. Says its important. I told him you have meeting but he refuse to go. He is waiting in the Office
krystyna.commissar: Mr Director, Commissar Putienko calls you to his office. Immediately!
